name: CM Yarn and Impala Memory and CPU

plot.title: CM YARN Memory and CPU Usage
plot.tsquery: select   allocated_memory_mb_cumulative, available_memory_mb, allocated_memory_gb, available_memory_mb, available_vcores, allocated_vcores, allocated_vcores_cumulative

plot.title: Cluster Level Memory and CPU across hosts
plot.tsquery:
SELECT
   cpu_percent_across_hosts, total_cores_across_hosts, 100 * total_physical_memory_used_across_hosts/total_physical_memory_total_across_hosts  as Total_Cluster_memory_Usage_Across_hosts, total_physical_memory_total_across_hosts  where category=CLUSTER

plot.title: YARN memory and CPU Used
plot.tsquery:
SELECT
   yarn_reports_containers_used_cpu, yarn_reports_containers_used_memory, yarn_reports_containers_used_vcores,  total_allocated_vcores_across_yarn_pools + total_available_vcores_across_yarn_pools as vcores_available_to_yarn,  yarn_reports_containers_used_memory ,  total_available_memory_mb_across_yarn_pools + total_allocated_memory_mb_across_yarn_pools as memory_available_to_yarn  FROM REPORTS
WHERE
   category=SERVICE

plot.title: Yarn Memory and CPU Available and Used
plot.tsquery:
SELECT
   yarn_reports_containers_used_vcores, total_allocated_vcores_across_yarn_pools + total_available_vcores_across_yarn_pools as vcores_available,  yarn_reports_containers_used_memory,  total_available_memory_mb_across_yarn_pools + total_allocated_memory_mb_across_yarn_pools as memory_available
FROM
   REPORTS
WHERE
   category=SERVICE

plot.title: New Impala CPU and Memory Metrics
plot.tsquery:
SELECT
   counter_delta(impala_query_thread_cpu_time_rate) as impala_total_cpu_used, counter_delta(impala_query_memory_accrual_rate) as impala_total_memory_used,total_impala_admission_controller_local_backend_mem_reserved_across_impala_daemon_pools as impala_total_reserved_memory, total_impala_admission_controller_local_backend_mem_usage_across_impala_daemon_pools as impala_total_used_memory,  total_mem_tracker_process_limit_across_impalads as total_available_memory
WHERE
   category=CLUSTER
